--- meta-description: Experience EVAS with a Virtual Reality Headset. meta-title: Virtual Reality Headset ---

Quick Start Instructions:

Press top button on the top center of headset for 3 seconds to power unit on.

Wait 30 seconds for home screen to appear.

Follow on screen instructions to use remote to select the EVAS app on top left of screen.

Press play by using the trigger button with your index finger and that’s it!

Hello from VisionSafe, manufacturer of the Emergency Vision Assurance System (EVAS)!

In the box you will find our current Virtual Reality headset with a pre-programmed 360 video of an EVAS demonstration (NOT a training video). The video loops between a view of EVAS deployed in a smoke filled environment, before showing a pilot deploy EVAS as the cockpit fills with smoke.

We at VisionSafe thank you for taking the time to get to know our product!

What you are viewing:

The video opens with a smoke filled cockpit and a view through EVAS. Then the video shows a deployment of EVAS. The pilot first notices the smoke, then dons his mask. He then deploys EVAS by pulling the unit out from the outboard side, near his left thigh (look down and to the left and you will see this). Then he places the unit on the glare shield and deploys EVAS, before the view changes to a view of EVAS through a smoke filled cockpit. The video loops so feel free to let it run and have others preview. Once finished just place back into the box.

Detailed Instructions:

  1. To power on the headset, press top center button on headset for 2-3 seconds. The screen will power on with a white oval on the screen. After about 10 seconds the headset will make a sound, then take another 20 seconds before it is ready to use.
  2. Once a screen appears with various icons to choose from, pick up the remote control and point it forward and press the Home button (the oval icon) with your thumb. This will center the remote and screen for you. If it doesn’t work on the first push, press the button once more.
  3. Point the remote at the EVAS icon the top left of the Home Screen, and use your index finger to push the Trigger button on the remote to select and start the app. That’s it! The EVAS experience will begin and the video will loop on itself until you choose to stop it.
  4. Once finished with the demo press the top center button to power down the unit, then select “power off” using the remote, and index finger Trigger button.

    If you have any additional questions please don’t hesitate to call us to walk you through it: (808) 777-6261
